title: Accidentally Buying the Wrong RP Item
body: I accidentally bought the wrong chroma skin for High Noon Yasuo, I only noticed this the first game i used the skin. Sadly, I do not have anymore refunds left, so I was wondering if anyone, including riot could help.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, once you're out of Tokens, there's no way to refund content such as this. Those refund tokens serve as the only exception to our [*no refund policy*](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).

Let me know if you have any other questions.
